sentences.en: Aim : To study the application of PCR - STR DNA typing in forensic diad paternity testing.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨常染色体STR基因座检测在二联体亲子鉴定中的应用价值.

sentences.en: Ancestral communication, maternity, paternity, fellowship, divine oaths.
sentences.cn: 与祖先沟通, 母性, 父权, 团体关系, 神的誓约(神的诅咒).

sentences.en: Emerging benefit issues included questions about maternity and paternity leave, and child care.
sentences.cn: 目前提出的新问题中有的关系到产假和儿童照料等.

sentences.en: I'd have a paternity test done and take him for millions.
sentences.cn: 我会让他做个亲子鉴定再从他那儿拿走100万.

sentences.en: If not, probability of paternity can be evaluated according to Essen - Moller � � s formula.
sentences.cn: 在不能排除亲权关系的前提下,按Essen—Moller氏公式计算父权概率,可作出存在亲权关系的结论.

sentences.en: In this form of family, as paternity is uncertain, only the female line counts.
sentences.cn: 因为在这种家庭形式下父系血统不能确定, 所以只承认女系.

sentences.en: Maternity leave , paternity leave , carers'leave and leave are not costs but essential to our wellbeing.
sentences.cn: 产假, 初为人父假期,护理者假期, 病假等对心灵健康至关重要,绝不是一种额外花费.

sentences.en: Recommended long - term investor paternity machine intervention, sharing the company's upcoming high - speed growth and income.
sentences.cn: 建议 长期 投资者侍机介入, 分享公司即将迎来的 高速 成长收益.

sentences.en: Tests were conducted to determine paternity.
sentences.cn: 通过检测而确定父子关系.

sentences.en: The cumulative discriminating power and probability of paternity exclusion were 0 . 9878 and 0 . 6648 respectively.
sentences.cn: 累计个人识别机率为0.9878,非父排除率为0.6648,是国内外已报道同步电泳分型方法中鉴别能力最高的.

sentences.en: The paternity of the child is in dispute.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子的生父是谁尚有疑问。

sentences.en: To study the application of PCR - STR DNA typing in forensic diad paternity testing.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨常染色体STR基因座检测在二联体亲子鉴定中的应用价值.

sentences.en: With each day that passes, I come more to terms with the question of my paternity.
sentences.cn: 每经过一天, 我都会更多的考虑有关我的父女关系的问题.

phrases.tran_cn: 亲权认定；父权检验；试验
